title: Atlas - Unparalleled Views. Exceptional Style. Nonstop Luxury!
posting_body: ['Atlas, Modern Luxury Living', 'As the first of its stature in Oakland, Atlas offers 40 stories of seamlessly blended history and premium, modern design.', "With sweeping views, a unique attention to detail and thoughtfully curated experiences, these residences are not only redefining luxury high-rise living—they're also perfectly placed to put you right at the center of art, action, dining, culture and everything else downtown does best.", 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 6', 'OR Text', '6', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text us.', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 650 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Ceiling heights from 9 feet', '- Garbage disposal', '- Bosch/Fischer & Paykel appliances in some units*', '- Frigidaire & Samsung appliances in some units*', '- French door refrigerator', '- In-unit washer & dryer', '- Full or Juliette balcony*', '- Floor-to-ceiling windows', '- Privacy window shades', '- Nest thermostat', '- Gas range', '*In select units', 'Community Amenities', '- EV Charging Available', '- Sunset Lounge with Cocktail Bar and Fireplace', '- Al Fresco Dining Area', '- 24-hour Courtesy Patrol', '- 13,000 Sq.', 'Ft. Terrace', '- Private Event Space', '- Fitness Center', '- Yoga/Spin Studio', '- Curated Resident Events & Activities', '- Coffee Bar', '- Sports & Media Lounge', '- Indoor/outdoor Club Lounge with Kitchen', '- Game Room', '- BBQs & Pizza Oven', '- Co-working Lounge & Meeting Rooms', '- Sweeping City Views', '- Fitness Classes', '- Towel Service in Fitness Club', '- Package Management System', '- Rooftop Deck', '- 24-hour Doorman', '- Dog Walking Space', '- Terrace Pool & Spa with Daybeds and Firepits', 'Pet Policy', 'Dogs & Cats permitted (2) pet max per household', '$500/Deposit', '$60/monthly Pet Fee', 'Income Requirements:', '2.2', 'Office Hours', 'Monday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Tuesday-Saturday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Atlas', '385 14th', 'St, Oakland, CA, 94612', 'Oakland midrise high rise views penthouse luxury rental new downtown', 'WPkelWTTp08']
